document.full_text: three children have died and 35 people have become ill from drinking nitrite-tainted milk in china's northwestern gansu province, xinhua news agency reported friday, the latest food safety scandal to hit the dairy industry.
document.title: nitrite-tainted milk kills 3 children in china
lines_and_colors: three children have died and 35 people have become ill from drinking nitrite-tainted milk in china's northwestern gansu province, xinhua news agency reported friday, the latest food safety scandal to hit the dairy industry.
